sentences.sContent: I assured him we didn't come here to proselytize.
sentences.sCn: 我向他保证我们并不是来改变他的信仰的。

sentences.sContent: Christians were arrested for trying to convert people, to proselytise them.
sentences.sCn: 基督徒因为试图改变他人的信仰而被捕。

remMethod.val: pros(靠近) + elyt(来到) + ize → 走到(佛祖)面前 → (使)皈依

words.tran: 改变信仰；改信宗教；劝诱

trans.tranOther: If you proselytize, you try to persuade someone to share your beliefs, especially religious or political beliefs
